attributes.action: Allow Tier 4 families to be together Christmas Day like Tiers 1-3.
attributes.additional_details: By not allowing families to meet in tier 4, you’re mentally damaging so many people. Christmas is already a make or break for some people mentally without telling them they can’t see their families for this one day, this is something many have looked forward to since March. Please just give us all Christmas Day. Some families haven’t even been able to meet their new grandchildren this year.. this was a saving grace for so many. We don’t need more reasons for people to die this year.
attributes.background: We would like the government to retract their decision yesterday to stop families coming together Christmas Day in Tier 4. This decision has been made at a time when people have made all the preparations and built their hopes up to have this time together after such an awful year.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reinstate the 5-day relaxation of COVID restrictions over Christmas: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564204

Allow families to have Christmas day together in all tiers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564312
